turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Candace, could you order me some coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking the Starbucks off of Durham-Chapel Hill Blvd in Durham?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, sure I can do that. Would you like it now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, do you want that sweetened or unsweetened.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any milk? I know you're lactose intolerant.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, good idea, let's do almond milk, just a splash.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have options for flavors too, any of that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, can I get some caramel flavoring?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just two, I don't want it too sweet.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, yes, one pump of espresso in that as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be ready to pick up at the Starbucks on Durham-Chapel Hill Blvd. They'll send you the receipt in a text message.
